arena.name: Tournament Arena
arena.description: A neutral arena for tournament battles

battleLog.attackCommentary: Vader attempts a decisive counter with the Force but gets overwhelmed! Godzilla unleashes a devastating Atomic Blast for 315 damage, staggering the dark lord in round one.
battleLog.defenseCommentary: Godzilla raises their guard against the incoming attack!
battleLog.randomEvent: Godzilla uses floor to enhance their attack!

battleLog.attackCommentary: Vader explodes into Godzilla's flank with a brutal Force-enhanced strike, connecting for a whopping 42 damage! Can this seismic blow push the King of Monsters off balance in round two.
battleLog.defenseCommentary: Round 2 is a test of resilience as Vader's focused Force attacks are met by Godzilla's atomic defiance. The clash leaves both relentless in their pursuit.
battleLog.randomEvent: Darth Vader narrowly dodges Godzilla's attack!

battleLog.attackCommentary: Vader's force barrier gets STOMPED as Godzilla finishes with a devastating Atomic Blast, leaving the dark lord reeling from 304 damage in round three! This fight is far from over.
battleLog.defenseCommentary: Vader's deflecting flames with precision in round three! Can he withstand Godzilla's escalating atomic pressure, or will a new opening emerge from this defensive standoff.
battleLog.randomEvent: Godzilla uses walls to enhance their attack!

battleLog.attackCommentary: Vader explodes with a Force-enhanced uppercut for 42 damage! The King of Monsters stumbles back, but this exchange could shift the momentum in the fight.  We're entering uncharted territory.
battleLog.defenseCommentary: Vader's force deflecting a volley of atomic fire is nothing short of SPECTACULAR. But can he withstand ROUND 4 and Godzilla's unrelenting rage for long.
battleLog.randomEvent: Darth Vader narrowly dodges Godzilla's attack!

battleLog.attackCommentary: Vader's force barrier buckles under a kinetic assault as Godzilla explodes in with a devastating Atomic Breath, leaving the dark lord staggering at 146 damage. This is one for the.
battleLog.defenseCommentary: Vader's Force choke is relentless in round 5, but Godzilla sidesteps each one with atomic-fueled agility! This clash of titans hinges on their next moves.
